import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { StoreContext } from "../../context/StoreContext"; import './PlaceOrder.css' const PlaceOrder = () => { const { getTotalCartAmount,token, food_list,vcart } = useContext(StoreContext); return (

Delivery Information

Cart Total

Subtotal

${getTotalCartAmount()}

Delivery Fee

${getTotalCartAmount()===0?0:2}

Total ${getTotalCartAmount()===0?0:getTotalCartAmount() + 2}
); }; export default PlaceOrder;
